id_n.desc: Unique positive numeric identifier for filing unit

inc_lease.desc: Income from the lease and sublease of goods or properties (First category)

value_prop_freeuse.desc: Taxable value of property let out free of cost

inc_stocks_dom.desc: Capital gains from stocks and securities (2nd category) - f1666

inc_stocks_foreign.desc: Capital gains from stocks and securities at foreing markets (MILA-Peru, Chile & Colombia) (2nd category) - f1666

inc_gross_prop_sale.desc: Gross Property sale income (2nd category) - f1665

inc_cap_other.desc: Other income  from capital disposition - 2nd category

inc_ind_work.desc: Independent work income (wages, compensations and fees) - 4th category

inc_board_dir.desc: Board of directors per diem income

ded_3UIT.desc: 3 UIT (Unidad Impositiva Tributaria or Tax Unit*) Deduction

foreign_tax_credit.desc: Foreign income tax credit - Labour Income

inc_interest.desc: income from interest carned on deposits

income_prop_freeuse.desc: income from free use of property

net_inc_cat1.desc: Net taxable category 1 income - post deductions

income_stocks_dom.desc: income from capital gains from sale of stocks / securities

income_stocks_foreign.desc: income from capital gains from sale of stocks / securities in foreign markets

income_cap_other.desc: income from capital gains from sale of other capital

income_prop_sale.desc: income from capital gains from sale of property

income_ind_work.desc: income from independent work - wages, compensation

income_board_dir.desc: income from per diem by Board Director

ded_stocks_dom.desc: Deduction - income from sale of stocks

ded_stocks_foreign.desc: Deduction - income from sale of stocks in foreign market

ded_prop_sale.desc: Deduction - income from sale of property

ded_cap_other.desc: Deduction - income from sale of other capital

ded_board_dir.desc: Deduction - income from per diem by Board Director

net_inc_nondiv_cat2.desc: Net taxable category 2 non-dividend income - post deductions

net_inc_div_cat2.desc: Net taxable category 2 dividend income - post deductions

net_inc_cat4.desc: Net taxable category 4 income - post deductions

net_inc_cat5.desc: Net taxable category 5 income - post deductions

ded_std.desc: Standard Deduction (7UIT in 2019) from work income

ded_addl.desc: Additional Deduction (3UIT in 2019) from work income

ded_fintax.desc: Financial Transaction Tax (ITF) Deduction in UIT

tti_w.desc: Total labor income from all sources

tti_c.desc: Total capital income from all sources

tti_w_behavior.desc: Total labor income from all sources including behavioral response

tti_cat1_behavior.desc: Total capital income from category1 sources including behavioral response

tti_cat2_behavior.desc: Total capital income from category2 sources including behavioral response

tti_div_behavior.desc: Total dividend income including behavioral response

total_gross_income.desc: Total gross income from all sources before deduction

pit_c.desc: Tax on capital income including behavioral response

pit_w.desc: Tax on labor income including behavioral response

pitax_net.desc: Net tax after foreign tax credit
